title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2002.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2002.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to implement certain provisions
of chapter 968 of the Laws of 1981 requiring the Facilities Development

Corporation to prescribe its procedures for assisting municipalities, upon
request, in connection with the design and/or construction of municipal
facilities. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2002.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
